wordpressPage.title: Student Downloads
wordpressPage.content:
If you’re heading off to university then we want to help you out! Please choose one of the downloads below. If you have any feedback or extra tips for us to include contact us.

Money Downloads

Database: A free database to help you manage what’s going in and out and budget ahead (requires Excel or OpenOffice) – click here to download

Money Tips: A free pdf file with top tips to help you manage money at university – Click here to download

Money Saving Expert: A useful page with tips for students. Click here.

Food Downloads

Food Tips: A free pdf file with top tips for getting the most food for your money and eating well – click to download
